welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nakao, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city known for its stunning nature, delicious cuisine, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Nakao has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atsugi NAS Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Yokota AFB Airport is used for transporting goods and military equipment.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
